mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Company ( user_idx, status, name, tel, address, category, ceo, employee_count, corporation_number, business_number, create_at, write_at ) VALUES ( #{userIdx}, #{Company.status}, #{Company.name}, #{Company.tel}, #{Company.address}, #{Company.category}, #{Company.ceo}, #{Company.employeeCount}, #{Company.corporationNumber}, #{Company.businessNumber}, #{Company.createAt}, NOW() )
